statements: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS program ( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, created_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), updated_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), name TEXT NOT NULL, model TEXT NOT NULL, is_deleted INTEGER, school_id TEXT, is_ops INTEGER, implementation_partner TEXT, funding_partner TEXT, institute_partner TEXT, country TEXT, state TEXT, block TEXT, cluster TEXT, village TEXT, program_type TEXT, institutes_count TEXT, students_count TEXT, devices_count TEXT, start_date TEXT, end_date TEXT, program_manager TEXT, district TEXT);

ALTER TABLE assignment ADD COLUMN is_firebase BOOLEAN;
ALTER TABLE class ADD COLUMN firebase_id TEXT;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS program;

CREATE TABLE program (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, block TEXT, cluster TEXT, country TEXT, created_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), updated_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), devices_count TEXT, district TEXT, end_date TEXT, funding_partner TEXT, implementation_partner TEXT, institute_partner TEXT, institutes_count TEXT, is_deleted BOOLEAN, is_ops BOOLEAN, model TEXT[], name TEXT NOT NULL, program_type TEXT, start_date TEXT, state TEXT, students_count TEXT, village TEXT);
